body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia              Now Showing! Watch the Three Trails Children's Musical, covering three national historic trails. Right here! Enjoy.              Travel the trail through images. Historic sites, scenic views, and National Register of Historic Places await your viewing pleasure.      Official Map and Guide Be sure to read Old Spanish Trail stories through this colorful brochure. You can also download or order it.      TIMELINE The longest, crookedest, most arduous pack mule route in the history of America is described in this timeline.
title: Old Spanish National Historic Trail: Photos & Multimedia
